ValidationRule.description: Interdire le changement de statut des Souscriptions Happe pour les conseillers N1 ou N2.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$Setup.ByPassSettings__c.ValidationRule__c, ISCHANGED(HP_Statut__c), OR($UserRole.DeveloperName = "HP_Conseiller_Niveau_1",$UserRole.DeveloperName = "HP_Conseiller_Niveau_2", $UserRole.DeveloperName = "HP_Conseiller_Niveau_1_TAD", $UserRole.DeveloperName = "HP_Conseiller_Niveau_2_TAD"), OR(ISPICKVAL( HP_Statut__c, "SAVE_3"), ISPICKVAL( HP_Statut__c, "SAVE_2"), ISPICKVAL( HP_Statut__c, "SAVE_2_CONFIRMED") ) )
